column1: janie belle martin thompson | marlan j. gary funeral home
column2: the chapel of peace | columbus oh| janie belle martin thompson. june 11
column3: 2015 by marlan gary leave a condolence janie belle martin-thompson was born on february 2
column4: 1926 to will hurt and mary agnes van. eaton in elkin
column5: north carolina. she went home to be with her heavenly father on june 6
column6: 2015. janie was a home health aide. she was a member of gospel tabernacle church uhc where she was a supporter of the womans ministry and the food pantry. janie was preceded by her parents
column8: frank lee martin jr. and charles e. martin
column11: and husbands frank lee martin sr. and avril e. thompson. she leaves to honor her memory daughters patsy p. simmons and julia a. (tom) ingram and son bobby (louise) hugh
column12: 28 grandchildren and a host of great and great-great grandchildren. visitation 11:00am and celebration of life 12:00 noon friday june 12
column14: 1205 hildreth ave. bishop j. derrick johnson presiding. interment at eastlawn cemetery. ministry of comfort entrusted to marlan j. gary funeral home
column15: the chapel of peace 2500 cleveland ave. offer condolence for the family of janie belle martin thompson print & condolences filed under: obituaries leave your condolence cancel replyname *email *
